si.title: දේශපාලනය වෛරයට පාත්ර වූ - හිටපු ජනාධිපති චන්ද්රිකා
body_lines: උත්සවයකදී රටේ වර්තමාන තත්ත්වය පිළිබඳව අදහස් දැක්වීමට ඔහුගෙන් ඉල්ලා සිටියේය.
දේශපාලන සලකුණ මතු වූ විට, මම දේශපාලනයට පිළිකුලට පත්වන බව ඔහු පැවසීය.

en.title: Politics hated - former President Chandrika
body_lines: He was asked to comment on the current situation in the country at an event.
He said that when the political mark was raised, I was disgusted with politics.

summary_lines: Former President Chandrika expressed disgust with politics when asked about the current situation, highlighting his distaste for political corruption.
